entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
